name: The Nameless Tree
description:
Help Murder Abernathy quell an evil presence....

Made for my friend Chros :)

NOTE: Notepad will reopen in the same position you last closed it in. If you want your notepad files to be in a certain spot on your desktop, just close one of the notepad files the game opens, and the rest will open there (closing a file during the game is fine -- just don't close the terminal!)

Terminal commands are: 

go forward

go back

turn left

turn right

stop

ps i ran out of time this week, and the game just kind of ends...alas,

Rain sounds are by TUNABIZZ

Source Code

Unity project: https://github.com/jamschutz/ChrosGame_Unity

Terminal application: https://github.com/jamschutz/ChrosGame_C-/blob/main/inputManager.cpp
